INTERACTION_REQUIRES_INV_REASON: Fewer Realm holdings than §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! or a primary title claim
EVTDESC3407: I tried to get away with repeating [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s opinion about the stained glass window, but [From.GetHerHis] probing questions made me confess in the end. I hated the colors and the motif was just stupid.
EVTDESC5042: We started early, the sun had barely risen above the horizon. There was plenty of prey, the dogs caught many rabbits and I slew one great boar before he killed my horse.
